hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# export variables
export CLOUDHMI_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/CloudHmi export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/libweintek_${TRIGGER_PARAM_JOB_GROUP}/workspace export DSERVER_PATH=${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/dserver_${TRIGGER_PARAM_JOB_GROUP}/workspace export GUI_PATH=${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/gui_${TRIGGER_PARAM_JOB_GROUP}/workspace export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}/build-${TRIGGER_PARAM_JOB_GROUP}-branch
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT-iv5") export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT-iv5/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ;; "cMT-iv5-3000") export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ;; esac
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT-iv5-3000") export PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER=cMT-iv5 ;; *) export PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER=${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} ;; esac
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT-iv5") export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=.iv5 ;; "cMT-iv5-3000") export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=.iv5 ;; esac
if [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "Ubuntu" ]; then export PATH=/opt/Qt5.4.2/5.4/gcc_64/bin:${PATH} fi
# clear artifacts
rm -f ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/CloudHmi* rm -f ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/cMTViewer* rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts mkdir ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts
# prepare out-of-source build
cd ${WORKSPACE}/build if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_VIEWER_BUILD_POLICY}" = "brandnew" ]; then rm -rf jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} fi if [ ! -d "jenkins" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins fi if [ ! -d "jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} fi cd jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}
# generate makefile
cp ${WORKSPACE}/build/${PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER}/*features.pri . ${WORKSPACE}/build/${PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER}/qmake_viewer.sh ${CLOUDHMI_PATH} ${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} ${DSERVER_PATH} ${GUI_PATH} ${INSTALL_PREFIX} ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} RelWithDebInfo
# make
if test -n "${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN}"; then source ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} fi make VERBOSE=1 cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/CloudHmi ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts/CloudHmi.RelWithDebInfo
# strip and encrypt
cd ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin if [ -e "CloudHmi" ]; then strip CloudHmi tar -cv CloudHmi >> CloudHmi.tar if test -n "${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME}"; then test_mtcrypt --encrypt CloudHmi.tar --out cMTViewer${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME} cp cMTViewer${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME} ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts else cp CloudHmi.tar ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts fi fi

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
:: set variables
set WORKSPACE_DIR=%cd% set WORK_UTIL_DIR=c:\jenkins\work
:: clear artifacts
rmdir /s %WORKSPACE_DIR%\artifacts mkdir %WORKSPACE_DIR%\artifacts
:: prepare build environment
xcopy /y %WORK_UTIL_DIR%\script\build_win32.bat . xcopy /y %WORK_UTIL_DIR%\project_properties\cloudhmi.props .
%WORK_UTIL_DIR%\utilities\fnr.exe --cl --dir "%cd%" --fileMask "cloudhmi.props" --find "<WEINTEKDIR>..\..\..\libweintek</WEINTEKDIR>" --replace "<WEINTEKDIR>C:\jenkins\workspace\libweintek_dev\MATRIX_AXIS_NODE\windows\MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM\win32</WEINTEKDIR>" %WORK_UTIL_DIR%\utilities\fnr.exe --cl --dir "%cd%" --fileMask "cloudhmi.props" --find "<DSERVERDIR>..\..\..\d-server</DSERVERDIR>" --replace "<DSERVERDIR>C:\jenkins\workspace\dserver_dev\MATRIX_AXIS_NODE\windows\MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM\win32</DSERVERDIR>" %WORK_UTIL_DIR%\utilities\fnr.exe --cl --dir "%cd%" --fileMask "cloudhmi.props" --find "<GOTDIR>..\..\gui</GOTDIR>" --replace "<GOTDIR>C:\jenkins\workspace\gui_dev\MATRIX_AXIS_NODE\windows\MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM\win32</GOTDIR>"
:: build project
call build_win32.bat CloudHmi release %TRIGGER_PARAM_VIEWER_BUILD_POLICY% xcopy /y Win32\Release\cMTViewer.exe %WORKSPACE_DIR%\artifacts

hudson.tasks.Mailer.recipients: katte@weintek.com paul@weintek.com zen@weintek.com easonwu@weintek.com jeremyhong@weintek.com clydeliu@weintek.com
